overview: End of the 1970's after Jesus Christ. The whole of Gaul is brought into line with the supremacy of nuclear energy and its world. All of it? No, because one village of die-hard Bretoners is still resisting the invader and his power plant project. And life is not easy for the garrisons of mobile guards in the surrounding entrenched camps. Thus, without magic potion but with stones, cries and administrative appeals, the inhabitants of Plogoff conscientiously defy the French state.
title: Le dossier Plogoff
